overview: The Mormon Tabernacle Choir presents Ring Christmas Bells, the next musical masterpiece in a series of highly acclaimed and commercially successful holiday albums. Featuring Brian Stokes Mitchell, dubbed by the New York Times as “Broadway’s last leading man,” and Edward Herrmann (Gilmore Girls; Nixon)

production_companies.name: The Church of Jesus-Christ of Latter-Day Saints

tagline: Christmas with the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square
title: Ring Christmas Bells
